transcript:
Customer: Ja vyakti is aap call kelela hai, ti sadhya itar konashi bolat aahe. Aapan pratiksha karu shakta, kimva
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Executive: Ji good morning sir construction home me baat ho rahi hai?
Customer: Kaun hai?
Executive: Ji mai praveen baat kar raha hu Indiamart customer care team se sir.
Customer: Ha boliye na.
Executive: Ji ji sir aapka na ek concern aaya tha hamare paas lead se related aayi thi buylead aur inquiry ko lekar ke.
Customer: Correct hai.
Executive: To ha sir vahi mai product dekh raha tha ki aapko matlab kaafi issue ho raha hai bending jo aapka bar bending hai bar.
Customer: Bar bending bar cutting suspension platform.
Executive: Aur trimix ke regarding right?
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: To sir ye jo product aap jo deal kar rahe ho isse matlab leads me issue aa raha hai ki buylead aapko iske product ke regarding nahi mil rahi hai ya fir kuch other product ki aa rahi hai leads thoda sa bata denge.
Customer: Other other product ke hai magar ye product ke liye inquiry hi nahi aa raha hai mujhe.
Executive: Wo notification aata hai jab tak hum buy buy karte hai tab tak to wo matlab sold out hota hai ya fir thank you for your interest hota hai.
Customer: Achcha.
Customer: Aise ho raha hai within a one minute kiya to bhi vahi issue hai.
Customer: Aur aapke team ne mujhse kuch videos bhi mange the matlab uska screen record karke uske video bhi share karne ke liye bole the wo bhi kiya hai maine aapke team member ko.
Executive: Achcha achcha sir bilkul sir wo theek nahi thoda kar pa rahe the isiliye maine connect kiya ki aapko shayad dikkat aa rahi hai to mai ek bari baat karke isko turant resolve kara kara deta hu aapko theek hai aapka koi bahut badi problem nahi hai sir ye easily ho jayega.
Customer: Sir bahut bahut badi problem hai hamare liye last chhe mahine se inquiry nahi hai uska aur mai kam se kam last three month se mai follow up kar raha hu ye cheez ke liye.
Executive: Achcha sir to isse pehle jo aapke account manager the unse bolte nahi the aap?
Customer: Discussion to hua hai abhi kaun dekhiye jab bhi mujhe Indiamart ka call aata tha mai unse batata tha unko batata tha okay.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Customer: Abhi fir seriously liya gaya last month shayad okay to wo madam ne bola fir unhone workout kiya unhone kuch kiya nahi fir baad me mujhe fir ek wo madam abhi jo account manager hai shayad to unhone call kiya fir unko unhone bola ki kuch videos do teen din baad aap mere ko fir kuch videos vagera share kijiye bola unhone concern regarding fir unko video share kiye fir unka bhi response nahi aaya baad me fir maine help ke liye fir request raise kiya fir.
Executive: Ji ji ji sir bilkul sir mai aapko apna number bhi share kar dunga theek hai office ka jo mera number hai aap us pe bhi kabhi bhi koi issue hoga aap mujhe bhi turant connect kar sakte hai.
Customer: Mujhe kya kehna hai sir ye agar problem solve ho gaya to mera kuch business banega nahi to business hi nahi ho raha hai wo mixer ka inquiry aata hai plate compactor ka aata hai duniya bhar ke log uske piche rehte hai wo kuch order bhi nahi hota hai hamare pass revenue generate nahi ho raha hai to hum baad me problem aayega.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Sir mujhe ye bataiye ye jo primary number hai 84 wala ye kiska number hai?
Customer: Mera hi hai.
Executive: Aur secondary number aap hi ka owner of the company aap hi hai right?
Customer: Ha ha sir aapka shubh naam?
Customer: Akshay Wale.
Executive: Achcha Akshay Wale to Akshay ji ye jo apna business hai pure Maharashtra me target kar rahe hai ya all India me deal ho raha hai?
Customer: Nahi abhi filhal to Maharashtra me hai abhi Karnataka me bhi hum start kar rahe hai but specific area me.
Executive: Achcha matlab south region me bhi badhna chah rahe hai aap right right.
Customer: Ha Maharashtra to pura hi target hoga na sir.
Executive: Ha ji sir.
Customer: Maharashtra me bhi Nagpur vagera wo area nahi karte hai hum.
Executive: Nagpur.
Executive: Hmm theek hai to sir mai ek kaam kar raha hu aapko kya kehte hai ki ek dekhiye na video meet ka maine link bheja hai please usko join kijiye to mai aapka.
Customer: Sir mai abhi hospital me hu abhi mai aapko video meet karke kya hum discussion karenge boliye aap hi.
Executive: Sir video meet me ek bar aaiye mai cheeze aapka jo product ki cheeze hai na jisme aapko lead nahi aa rahi jis product me aapko jyada.
Customer: Ek kaam karta hu mai okay ek kaam karta hu hamare office se aapko call aayega ha ek emergency kam chale wo hote hi na aapko call karke fir aap unse video meet karke wo dekh lijiye.
Executive: Sir mai is cheez hospital me sab kuch theek hai na?
Customer: Ha nahi wo problem hi hai wo personal chal raha hai aapko mai bhej deta hu unse baat kijiye aap.
Executive: To sir ek bar number bata doge ek bar mai unse call kar leta hu.
Customer: Number dekhiye last me 38 lagaiye.
Executive: Ek minute na.
Customer: Last me kya keh rahe hai sir 38?
Executive: Ek minute ha ji ha 38 lagaiye last me 2288714538.
Executive: Ek ek second 8871
Executive: 71
Executive: 45
Executive: 4538
Executive: 38 ha kya naam hai sir?
Customer: Bhavna karke hai.
Executive: Achcha madam hai?
Customer: Ha to ye bhi dekhte hai account?
Customer: Ha hamare pass bada team hai but ye abhi available hai PC pe baithe hai okay unka ek chota sa kaam hai wo hote hi fir aapko wo baki ka bhi bata denge unse baat karke lijiye ek 5 10 minute baad call kijiye bas.
Executive: Sure sure sir bilkul kar dunga achcha sir ji bola hai to unse karke na mai cheez sahi kara ke fir aapko ek minute ke liye call karunga to bata dunga aapko aur unse bhi feedback aap le lijiyega ki praveen ji ne kya kya cheeze bataiye theek hai sir.
Customer: Chaliye sir yes sir okay thank you so much sir.
Executive: Thank you abhi mai aapko whatsapp bhi kar raha hu theek hai whatsapp pe ha likh ke bhej raha hu.
Customer: Ha nahi wo mam aapko matlab ye karenge.
Executive: Hmm ha bilkul bilkul ha okay rakho sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving inquiries for a specific product.

- Buyleads are often sold out quickly.

- Previous concerns not adequately addressed.

- Wants resolution for lack of inquiries.



Resolution:

- Executive will share his contact number.

- Executive offered a video meet to resolve issue.

- Customer to contact Bhavna after 5-10 minutes.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will contact Bhavna after 5-10 minutes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, inquiries, follow up, resolution, account manager
